original_text: Then Saul said to Samuel, ‘It is true, I have done a bad thing. I did not obey the Lord's command. I did not do what you told me to do. I was afraid of the army. I agreed to do what they wanted.
korean_text: 사울이 사무엘에게 이르되 내가 범죄하였나이다 내가 여호와의 명령과 당신의 말씀을 어긴 것은 내가 백성을 두려워하여 그들의 말을 청종하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: I have done a bad thing
I did not obey the Lord's command
I did not do what you told me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 하라고 한 것을 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: I was afraid of the army
I agreed to do what they wanted
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 원하는 것을 하기로 동의했습니다
